game.name: SEARCH ALL - CANDY
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the candies (candy wrappers) on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling". The game location displays an elven industrial town located in a forest where elves make their sweets
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the candies (candy wrappers) on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling". The game location displays an elven industrial town located in a forest where elves make their sweets

reviewHighlights.text: One-scene hidden object game. Very short playtime, around 15 minutes. Nice drawing. 10 easy achievements.
A chill hidden item puzzle game with easy music and relaxing music.
